activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8221
activity.text: I’m new to open-source contributions. I’ve increased the form's max-width by changing max-w-4xl to max-w-5xl. Here’s how it looks now. If this solution is satisfactory, could you please assign the issue to me? I’ll prepare a PR.

open_prs.title: Increased Form Size & Updated Indicator Field
